page.title: 09HILPERTON WHARF
page.content: Hiperton Wharf is situated on a narrow strip of land between the road and the Kennet and Avon Canal. It has now been turned into a marina for small motor cruisers and can have up to 71 boats moored at any one time.The majority of the vessels belong to private individuals, although a small number are the property of the Wharf's owners. The present owners bought the land and the Wharf Company in 1983 and completed the building of the jetty in 1985.The business is expanding as a result of many improvements. For example, a workshop and dry dock are soon to be built. There is very little problem with vandalism, but the owners did tell us that earlier this year a tramp stole a packet of cornflakes from one boat and a bag of sugar from another.
